New Form No-11 -Declaration Form

(To be Retained by the employer for future reference)

EMPLOYEE PROVIENT FUND ORGANIZATION

Employee's provient fund scheme,1952 paragraph(34 & 57)&

Employee pension Scheme 1995 (paragraph 24)

(Declaration by a person taking up employment in any establishment on which EPF Scheme 1952 and/or EPS, 1995 is applicable)

1 Name of the Member
2 Father Name / Spouse Name
(PLease tick which one is applicable)
3 Date of Birth: (DD/MM/YYYY)
4 Gender:(Male / Female / Transgender)
5 Marital Status:(Married / Unmarried / Widow / Widower / Divorcee)
6 (a). Email id
(b). Mobile No
7 Whether earlier a member of Employee's Provient fund scheme,1952 Yes/No
8 Whether earlier a member of Employee's Pension scheme,1995 Yes/No
9 Previous Employment Details:[if yes to 7 AND/OR 8 above]
(a). Universal Account Number
(b).Previous PF Account Number
(c).Date of Exit from Previous employment (DD/MM/YYYY)
10 (a). International Worker Yes/No
(b). If yes, state country of origin (India/Name of other country)
(c). Passport Number
(d). Validity of Passport (DD/MM/YYYY) to (DD/MM/YYYY)td>
11 KYC Details:(attach self attested copies of following KYC's)
(a). Bank account number & IFS Code
(b). Aadhar Number
(c). Permanent Account Number (PAN), if available

UNDERTAKING

  1. Certified that the particulars are true to the best if my knowledge
  2. I authorize EPFO to verify my aadhar for Verification/Authentication/eKYC purpose for service delivery
  3. kindly transfer the funds and service details, if applicable from the previous PF account as declared above the present P.F account (The transfer would be possible only if the the identified KYC detal approved by previous employer has been verified by present employer using his Dital Signature Certificate)
  4. In case of changes in above details, the same will be intimated to employer at the earliest

Date:

Place:                                                                                                                     Signature of Member







DECLARATION BY PRESENT EMPLOYER


  1. The member Mr/Ms. Mrs has joined.............................has joined on ............................. and has been allocated PF Number................................................

  2. In case person was earlier not a member of EPF Scheme, 1952 and EPS, 1995:

    • (Post allotment of UAN) The UAN allotted for the member is.............................
    • Please Tick the Appropriate Option:

           The KYC Details of the above member in UAN Database

    • Have not been uploaded
    • Have been uploaded but approved
    • Have been uploaded and approved with DSC
  3. In case the person was earlier a member of EPF Scheme, 1952 and EP5, 1995:
    • The above PF Account number/UAN of the member as merboned in (1) above has been tagged with his/her UAN/Previous Member ID as dedared by member.
    • Please Tick the Appropriate Option:-
      1. The KYC details of the above member in the UAN database have been approved with Digital Signature Certificate and transfer request has been generated on portal
      2. As the DSC of establishment are not registered with EPFO, the member has been informed to file physical claim (From 13) for transfer of funds from his previous establishment
